parameters.content:
## Email intake & AI analysis
Fetch emails and analyze with Grok AI

## Validation & assignment
Validate AI output and assign to teams

## Task creation & notifications
Create ClickUp tasks and notify via Slack

## Logging & customer response
Log to Google Sheets and send acknowledgment emails

## Customer support triage automation with AI, ClickUp and Google Sheets

This workflow automates customer support ticket triage by analyzing incoming emails with AI, categorizing them, creating tasks in ClickUp, and notifying your team via Slack.

## How it works

1. **Email ingestion**: Fetches new support emails from Outlook inbox
2. **AI analysis**: Uses Grok AI to classify tickets by category (Bug Report, Feature Request, Billing, etc.) and urgency level (Low, Medium, High, Critical)
3. **Validation**: Ensures AI outputs meet required format and quality standards
4. **Smart assignment**: Routes tickets to appropriate teams based on category and calculates SLA deadlines
5. **Task creation**: Creates organized tasks in ClickUp with proper priority, tags, and descriptions
6. **Tracking**: Logs all tickets to Google Sheets for reporting and analytics
7. **Notifications**: Alerts support team via Slack, with special escalation channel for urgent issues
8. **Customer acknowledgment**: Sends automated email replies with ticket details and tracking links

## Setup steps

1. **Connect Outlook**: Authenticate your support email account in the "Fetch Support Email list" node
2. **Configure Grok AI**: Add your xAI API credentials in the "Analysis with Grok" node
3. **Set up ClickUp**: Connect your ClickUp workspace and select the list where tasks should be created
4. **Link Google Sheets**: Connect your Google account and create a spreadsheet with columns matching the workflow (Timestamp, Subject, From, Category, Urgency, etc.)
5. **Configure Slack**: Add Slack credentials and set up two channels - one for general notifications (#support) and one for escalations (#support-escalation)
6. **Set up Gmail**: Connect Gmail for sending acknowledgment emails to customers
7. **Customize assignment rules**: Edit the "Smart Assignment & SLA" node to match your team structure and SLA policies
8. **Test the workflow**: Run manually with a test email before activating

Once configured, this workflow runs automatically whenever new emails arrive, handling the complete triage process from intake to notification.
